Entries.divorced: I can't believe I let you trick me like that.$a
Entries.danceRejection: Nah... I'm gonna stay here and watch only.
Entries.dumped_Guys: Is this all a game for you?$a
Entries.secondChance_Guys: If you hurt me again I will sue you and take %pet, take your house, take your shoes, take your horse.$7
Entries.Mon: Hey, did you know there used to be a lot of monsters in this mine.$e#Don't worry, I got rid of them.
Entries.Tue: I used to be an archeologist and I'm a member of the adventure's guild.$0
Entries.Wed: You see the skeleton in front of my tent, I killed the monster myself.$0#$e#What?!I'm not joking.$3#
Entries.Thu: Did you see anyone in the mines?$s#$b# No?! I must be hearing things.$6
Entries.Fri: Ever since I placed the blessed amulet in the Yoba Shrine, monsters have fled the mines.$0#$e#I wonder who built the shrine.
Entries.Sat: There is still one monster that lives in the lake, well, it's actually a Shark, you need to be really strong to catch it.$0
Entries.Mon2: I had the craziest dream last night.$0#$e#Me and Laura were...nevermind.$s
Entries.Tue2: Be careful with the Flytraps, they can't rip off your arm, but they may leave a nasty scar if they bite you.
Entries.Tue4: I don't really know what season we are. I never go to the surface.$7
Entries.Sun2: At least there are nut trees here so I don't eat only ancient fruit and shrooms.$7#$e#But I'm sick of eating nuts as well.$3
Entries.Wed2: Ok, I confess I was joking about the skeleton. It's been dead for a long time.$1#$e#What do you mean you by of course you were joking.$3#
Entries.Thu2: Did you find the girl in the upper level?$7#$e# Hey don't joke around. I heard her loud and clear before you came down the stairs.$a#$e#What? You are not joking!?$6
Entries.Thu4: I miss Laura so much.$s#$b# But thanks to you I don't feel lonely all the time.$1
Entries.Fri4: What should I eat today. Ancient fruit, mushrooms or nuts?$s#$e#I'm growing tired of eating the same thing over and over.$3#$b#Hey, would you mind bringing me something you grew yourself next time you are around?$1
Entries.Sat4: You see, the valley is very large, but I managed to close the passage to the otherside as there are wild animals there.$0#$e#Oh, yeah there are some small dinos there. It's were I get the eggs.
Entries.Sun6: Hey, you're back.$1#$e#Ever since you started coming here more often, I stopped having crazy dreams and hearing stuff in the mines.
Entries.event_journal2: Why would you lie about that when I clearly saw you reading it?$a
Entries.Laura_event: Thanks, but I think I should start to move on!
Entries.give_flowersA: Oh, I'd love to be your boyfriend!$4.
Entries.give_flowersB: I will be your funny valentine!$4
Entries.give_pendant: . . . .$6#$b#Yes! Of course I do!$4#$b#I will pack my stuff and talk to the mayor, this should take three days.$4#$b#Oh, I was hoping to ask you first!$1
Entries.stardrop_gift: Hey babe, I wanted to give you this stardrop, it is a token of gratitude for being such an amazing husband!^Hey babe, I wanted to give you this stardrop, it is a token of gratitude for being such an amazing wife!@.$4
Entries.rejectNPCA: I think it's a little too early to think of that.$7
Entries.rejectNPCB: Sorry, I don't think I'm ready to move on yet.$s
Entries.reject_two_heartA: Hmmm...I'm not sure about this. How do I know I can trust you?$7
Entries.reject_two_heartB: What if we take things light and breezy? Let's be friends first!$1
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: Date a guy you barely know? That's scarier than fighting monsters.$6
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: As far as I am concerned you could be a serial killer.$7
Entries.reject_four_heartA: Sorry, the feeling is not mutual.$s
Entries.reject_four_heartB: I'm not ready to move on, I still miss Laura.$s
Entries.engageA: I'd accept that, but my gut tells me this is a bad idea. Do you have any secrets you'd like to share?$7
Entries.engageB: I have a feeling you might be hiding something, so I'll pass on that.$7
Entries.marriedA: I take marriage very seriously. You should too.$a
Entries.marriedB: Sure, I'd always wanted to be someone's lover...$3
Entries.refusal_knownA: I'd love to marry you, but your place is kinda small at the moment and so is my tent.$s
Entries.refusal_knownB: I'd say yes if I knew how to build houses. Then I'd build a big house for us.$1
Entries.refusal_botherA: I wonder if I should turn off the mine cart and break the stairs.$3
Entries.refusal_botherB: Sorry, am I speaking dwarvish? I told you no already!$a
